Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Springbok
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A general all-rounder vehicle, the Springbok performs well in all categories with a good cargo and passenger capacity. The old, robust build and loud engine negatively affect its fuel efficiency and visibility. Best suited on flat roads and will struggle somewhat on hills, snow or winter tiles.

A slightly worse performer compared to tier 2 vehicles, it is instead a stylish vehicle to drive and will provide a mood boost to all passengers.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
